sections.title: Description
sections.raw_content: The randseed procedure restarts one of the sequences generated by randnext. Each restart with the same seed causes randnext to produce the same sequence for the given sequence.
sections.text_content: The randseed procedure restarts one of the sequences generated by randnext. Each restart with the same seed causes randnext to produce the same sequence for the given sequence.
sections.mdown_content: The **randseed** procedure restarts one of the sequences generated by **randnext**. Each restart with the same seed causes **randnext** to produce the same sequence for the given sequence.
